$0700.HK: Tencent protests its inclusion on the U.S. military-linked list, with shares dropping 7.3% in Hong Kong.

Tencent <0700.HK> shares down 7% in HK at the market bell after the firm was added to US "Section 1260H list" of entities that qualify as "Chinese military companies". The tech giant says its inclusion on the list was "clearly a mistake"   www.reuters.com/world/us-add...
$0700.HK: Tencent Holdings Ltd. faces challenges due to weak consumer demand and competition, with its cloud computing business not experiencing explosive AI demand.
